text: Vasily Ivanovich Bagretsov (Russian: Василий Иванович Багрецов; born 1930) is a Russian rower who represented the Soviet Union. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki with the men's coxless pair where they were eliminated in the round one repêchage. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1952 Summer Olympics
title: Vasily Bagretsov
